timeline.content: Hey Namrita, I am Arushi and I'll be helping you book your ideal student home. Happy to assist you with the process ahead. We will take care of the entire paperwork and rental agreement on your behalf. amber provides you with a hassle-free experience! Please let me know if you have any queries or specific requests. Also, if you have friends looking for accommodation, you can refer them at http://amberstudent.com/refer. If your referred friend books accommodation, you will get a 50 GBP Amazon gift card. Check what our community of students have to say about us: https://www.trustpilot.com/review/amberstudent.com Thankyou : )

transcripts.transcript_text:
Speaker A: Hello. Hi Namrata, this is Arushi from Amber student partnered with University College London. How are you?
Speaker B: Yeah, I'm good, how are you?
Speaker A: I'm good. Accommodation in London and I can see that you like quite a few properties like I chapter South Bank. So have you finalized any of those?
Speaker B: Yeah, actually my I had few questions is I'm moving in with the dependent. So there is an option of dual occupancy, right?
Speaker A: Yes, there is an option of dual occupancy but in dual occupancy both the students need to be, you know students like both the people need to be students but in London do know 1 to 2PMGs which do allow a dual occupant who is not a student. So for that I need to be. I, I think it's Londonist and Londones Both are the PMGs but I still need to be 100. Sure. So if you allow some time, can I check that with my team and we'll share the options with you on WhatsApp and mail and then once because.
Speaker B: My husband won't be a student I am joining UCL as a postdoc or postdoctoral scientist. So postdoctoral scientist also falls. So I'll be having an ID and everything from ucl. But will that also means you have. Since I could see there are grads, post grads and non students. So in which category you will be? I will be actually, you know, you subdivided.
Speaker A: So you have a offer letter from the university, right?
Speaker B: Yes.
Speaker A: Like, like a student, proper student offer it. Offer letter. Right.
Speaker B: I'm, I, I'm not a student. I'll be on salaried position. Like I have my salary scale for them and then I don't know what postdocs are, you know, considered their student or staff, non student kind of stuff because the offer letter which I have is the position states postdoctoral or research associate.
Speaker A: Okay. Okay. And so basically our visa is not a student visa, it's a research visa.
Speaker B: Yeah, it's a global talent visa. Yeah.
Speaker A: Okay. So yes, from what I know is Londonest and Londonist does allow but then again for the dual occupant like both the people has to be non students. I'll have to check that. So if you allow me some time, let me connect with my team and I will share the exact properties which will allow you and your husband to be. And then once I share those with you, whenever you're free, have a look at them and we can connect on call again to discuss the properties in detail. Yeah, perfect. Thank you so much. Thank you. Bye bye.

Speaker A: Hello, this is Aushi from am. Good evening. Yeah, good evening.
Speaker B: So I just saw your query and wanted to discuss regarding the same. Yeah, so I, I have, I've written the message that there's only one property which accepts dual occupancy studio. Okay. And the dual occupancy studio, they are fine with a non student as well. But if you and your husband are comfortable with two separate rooms as in booking two on suits then we, we can have more options for the same two separate.
Speaker A: No, we, we won't be needing like it's like we. He is mostly my dependent so most of the time even his passport, his visa is as a dependent as a pbs. So we wouldn't want to have a separate entity. We want to share the council tax and everything so that you know, in future we can show that we are living together. We don't want to go up above our clause of both GTVN as a GTV dependent. So that's why we were looking for a single unit.
Speaker B: Okay. Okay. Yeah. So considering that only I, I mean there's just one property. So the next is the PMG that accepts non students and this PMG Also it has 3, 4 properties but only this one is the property which accepts, you know, do it.
Speaker A: So that's, that's near where UCL unit we are like comfortable if there are properties that are beyond zone two, zone three or zone four, not just like near around ucl. I'm okay with the commuting to and fro if, if that's required. If you have properties that are.
Speaker B: I totally got your point. Just that like I informed you there's just one PMG which accepts non students. Okay. In that case. And at this property also there's a twin bed studio so it's like a shared room where both of you will share the washroom and the kitchen. And the rent is 440 per week.
Speaker A: So the 440 per week is like two beds with one kitchen and but it's written in that property that the 440pcm is they have a shared kitchen and shared thing with some other rooms as well or just like it's that kitchen and that.
Speaker B: So it's a, it's a studio. So basically it will be a shared room where only the two of you will share the washroom and the two of you will share the kitchen.
Speaker A: Okay. Okay. So that is the 440 unit which you have sent.
Speaker B: Yes. And this property has a laundry room, a gym, a study room, a bike storage, communal lounge and your entire would include wi fi, electricity, heating, water. So all utilities are included in this.
Speaker A: We thought that there, since there were.
Speaker B: 12 different rooms that for us it.
Speaker A: Would be like the bronze. That would be. But if you're saying that the 440, it's like 440 per week, right?
Speaker B: Yes, that's per week. Wait, let me send you a screenshot of the same so that we, you know, you don't get confused in future.
Speaker A: So I mean the other ones are.
Speaker B: Not for dual occupancy. Only the single room is there for dual occupancy in this building. I am just sharing a screenshot so that you don't get confused for your future reference. Yes. And no guarantor is required. So it's not like that. You need a UK based guarantor. You can book it like this property offers maximum six installments. Okay.
Speaker A: So the shared room and shared bathroom, that's written over here, it's between the two of us. That is me and my husband, right? Yes. And the contract will be made in.
Speaker B: One person's name only. That is how it goes in dual occupancy. So the contract can be made in.
Speaker A: Your name and the two of you.
Speaker B: Will share the rent for this. This is not per person, this is the 440. So it will be 220 for him and 220 for you. And then contract will be made in one person's name. So like. Okay, that's how it's going to be.
Speaker A: Okay, I'll discuss it over with my husband and then I, I can call you back in the same number if.
Speaker B: Sure. Yes, you can. Yes, yes. And if, if I'll not be able to answer the call, maybe I'll be on another call with a student. You can leave me a message on WhatsApp. So when once I get free, I'll definitely give you a call back.
Speaker A: Okay, sure, sure.
Speaker B: Thank you. Thank you so much. Thank you. Bye bye.

Speaker A: Yeah.
Speaker B: Hi, how are you?
Speaker A: Yeah.
Speaker B: Yes. Did you speak with your husband regarding the property?
Speaker A: Yeah. So actually we have another thing in mind. We don't want those separate rooms. And also if your agency kind of helps us get a private accommodation not related to student requirement, because we both will be needing lease on our name, we cannot do it on just me because my visa, he's serving as my dependent. So to keep our route to ilr, we would need to show that we both are kind of cohabiting. So we would need, we would need the lease to be on both our names. So if, if your agency kind of deals with just private accommodations, if that, that's the case, then it would be better for us.
Speaker B: Actually we only deal with student accommodation. We don't deal with private accommodation. Okay, yes, that will be a little difficult for me to find something for you. No issues. Still, if you ever need the competition, you can let me know on WhatsApp.
Speaker A: Yeah. If. If we do not land up getting it anything as, as we know that land, you know, London takes a lot of time to get a proper accommodation. We are keeping it in a. As a backhand choice because if we do not really end up getting a proper private accommodation, then we would go for the accommodation which you have provided us.
Speaker B: No worries. Just let me know on WhatsApp whenever you need my help. Thank you so much. Thank you. Bye Bye.
